Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Palette for cosmetics
Description: Palette for cosmetics in the shape of a truncated diamond with strong curving edges. Hewn from an opaque quartz, the colour of which varies from very pale grey to dark red, it bears green traces on one surface which are the remains of malachite, a product often used in cosmetics by A-Group people.
